Html:
I downloaded the setup and installed the v4 of MVVM. I don't see SimpleIoc which is shown in MIX11 Deep dive demo. Is it removed ? 

As an alternative I downloaded the example shown in MIX11 and using Win7 dll file from the example. But it may impact. Does anybody have any update on this ?

Actually it should be in there. Not sure what DLLs you got. It is in the Extras DLL. Make sure you get the latest, I just published RTM.

Cheers,
Laurent
